isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC), Orifice Tube System, Pre-March 2007 - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500, 8600 - SPECIAL TOOLS - ELECTRONIC LEAK DETECTOR

svcproc.title: ELECTRONIC LEAK DETECTOR
svcproc.para: Electronic Leak Detector (ZTSE4617) detects leaks in air conditioning systems by utilizing 100 per cent solid state electronic circuitry (refer to Figure 88). An LED provides a low battery warning. The LED also indicates when calibration is accomplished without the usual, inconvenient, external reference leak source. An audio leak indicator ensures efficient operation even in bright sunlight. The power source is four "AA" alkaline batteries. This detector may be used for both R-12 and R-134a systems.
